channel.title: FAM Final Main Thread - Game Over - Mafia + Imperials win!
channel.description:
# [color=ffc60a]Welcome to FoL's Annual Mash![/color] Hosted by @Chloe, @DatBird, @Geyde, @Arete, and @osieorb18 Host account: @FoLAnnualMash Big thanks to Marl and Firekitten for their moral support.
## [color=ffe296]Rules[/color] Follow the [Global Forum Rules](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) as well as the [Forum Game Rules](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-game-rules/78926) Flavorclaiming is not allowed. More information can be found farther down. ## [color=ffe296]What is FAM?[/color] All roles are custom-made, and will be designed based on the players who join the game. You may even get lucky and roll yourself! Everybody will have one or more ability/passive; *nobody will be vanilla.* This game will feature In-Thread-Attacks (ITAs). Along with this, there will be events in which you can earn prizes (or death)! There will be at least two factions - Town and Mafia. Third-party roles (neutrals) may exist. ## [color=ffe296]Voting[/color] * Both majority and plurality are in effect. * All votes must be in the form of `**/vote [player]**` to be considered valid, and all unvotes must be in the form `**/unvote**`. After voting in the main thread, send a link to the post in which you voted in the voting thread, or will not be counted. * You may self-vote. Along with this, no-elimination is a valid vote, and may be hammered to end the day early. In cases where no-elim and another vote are tied at the end of the day, no-elim will have priority in the rand. * Tied votes will result in a player being eliminated at random from among the tied players. * MyLo (mis-eliminate and lose) and LyLo (eliminate or lose) will not be announced, and votes will not be locked. ## [color=ffe296]Gameplay[/color] * Days are 36 hours and nights are 12 hours. In the instance the day ends early due to majority, the Night phase will be extended to begin at a consistent time. * Deadline to submit Night actions is 2 hours before Night ends. * Deadline to submit Day actions is 1 hour before Day ends, unless specified otherwise. * Barring the potential existence of janitors, flips will always be true. Rolecards will not be fake. Conversion does not exist. Game-ending jesters do not exist. * Other than the above, everything is on the table (: * We will be following [Natural Action Resolution](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Natural_Action_Resolution). If there are any major issues with NAR, [Reasonable Action Resolution](https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Reasonable_Action_Resolution) may be utilized. (We don't expect this to occur) * Should the main thread reach 9k posts, a new thread will be created. ## [color=ffe296]ITAs[/color] * Every day starting Day 2, there will be a single ITA window that begins 6 hours after SoD, and ends 6 hours before EoD. During this period, you may submit an ITA by typing some variety of `**/ITA [player]**` and pinging the host account: @FoLAnnualMash * ITAs have a base accuracy of 10% * Do not attempt to ITA if you are out of shots. If you shoot a dead player, your shot will be refunded * If a player is protected from an ITA, the feedback will be 'Hit! Nobody died.' Otherwise the feedback will be a death, or 'Miss!' * ITAs will be disabled after a certain point. This will be whenever the hosts deem fit. ## [color=ffe296]Rolecards and Flavor[/color] ### Example Rolecard >
> > > **Chloe** > *'its not fucking o???'* > [color=green]**Town Idiot**[/color] >
> > **Expert of Forum Mofoa:** All instances of the letter *i* that you post in the thread must be replaced with the letter *o*. To bypass this restriction, you may post freely as long as you include an image of a cat within your post. > > *Eliminate the Mafia and all other possible threats to the Town.* The user is **Chloe**, the role name is [color=green]**Town Idiot**[/color], and the flavor is *'it's not fucking o???'* as well as 'Expert of Forum Mofoa.'
# [color=darkred]**DO NOT FLAVORCLAIM OR PARAPHRASE FLAVOR. YOU MAY ONLY CLAIM YOUR USER AND ROLE**[/color]
**Do not claim or paraphrase any quotes or flavor within your rolecard. Do not claim the name of your abilities or passives. You may paraphrase what your passives or abilities *do*, but may not repeat the text word-for-word.** The alignment of any User will be entirely random. Attempting to solve the game based on flavor is useless. ### Standard Win Conditions [color=green]**Town**[/color] is the uninformed majority. Their win condition is: *Eliminate the Mafia and all other possible threats to the Town.* [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] is the informed minority. Their win condition is: *You win the game if no more threats to the Mafia exist or nothing can prevent that from happening.* Other win conditions may or may not exist. --- # Players 1. @Solic 25. @clonedcheese 31. @Gghana 32. @katze 39. @Frostwolf103 46. @orangeandblack5 # Dead Players 1. **eevee** - Modkilled Day 1 - [color=green]**Italy: Town Godfather**[/color] 2. **Firekitten** - Died Day 1 - [color=green]**Marluxion: Town Tunneler**[/color] 3. **Tangeld** - Eliminated Day 1 - [color=cyan]**TheLukundo: Imperial Passive JOAT**[/color] 4. **Marshal** - Killed Night 1 - **[color = green]Icibalus, Town "Cop"[/color]** 5. **Nightingale** - Killed Night 1 - **[color = green]Frostwolf103, Town Illuminati Cult Leader[/color]** 6. **Wazza** - Killed Night 1 - **[color = green]Centuries, Town Shitposter[/color]** 7. **sulit** - Died Day 2 - **[color = green]Appelsiini, Town ITA Nerfer[/color]** 8. **astand** -> lol - ITA'd Day 2 - **[color = red]Joker, Mafia Suspicious Peddler[/color]** 9. **Intensify** - ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green]**an_gorta_pratai: Town Tree**[/color] 10. **TheLukundo** - ITA'd Day 2 - **[color = red]Jane, Mafia Spectator[/color]** 11. **MaximusPrime** - ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green]**Mistyx: Town Support JOAT**[/color] 12. **Icibalus** - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=green]**PokemonKidRyan: Town Ringmaster**[/color] 6. **KyoDaz** - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=green]**Amelia: Town Reverser**[/color] 14. **Amelia** - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=red]**Wazza: Mafia Nanobiologist**[/color] 22. **Joker** - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=green]**Marshal: Town Greatest (Wo)man That Ever Lived**[/color] 38. **Hippoyeetus** - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=red]**Nightingale: Mafia Painter**[/color] 44. **Psyx -> Leafia** - Boatsed Day 2 - [color=red]**Luxy: Mafia Jailkeeper**[/color] 12. **min** - ITA'd Day 2 - [color=green]**ArcticXI: Town Ransomer**[/color] 19. **Whysper** - Eliminated Day 2 - [color=green]**Hippoyeetus: Town Outer doG Cult Leader**[/color] 20. **Silviu200530** - Killed Day 2 - [color=green]**katze: Town Chaos**[/color] 17. **SirDerpsAlot -> EliThePsycho** - Killed Night 2 - [color=red]**Ami: Mafia Claim Vigilante**[/color] 22. **Aelin** - Killed Night 2 - [color=green]**SirDerpsAlot: Town Champion**[/color] 23. **Marluxion** - Killed Day 3 - [color=green]**Firekitten: Town Spankvig**[/color] 45. **nutella** - ITA'd Day 3 - [color=red]**Orangeandblack5: Mafia Solar Car Cult Leader**[/color] 43. **Universal** - ITA'd Day 3 - [color=green]**Solic: Town Time Reaper**[/color] 26. **Appelsiini** - Eliminated Day 3 - [color=green]**sulit: Town Strongman**[/color] 27. **Esooa** - Killed Night 3 - [color=green]**KyoDaz: Town Dark Lord Cult Leader**[/color] 28. **PokemonKidRyan** - Killed Night 3 [color=green]**Tangeld: Town Lovebird**[/color] 29. **ArcticXI** - Killed Night 3 - [color=green]**Psyx: Town Inquisitor**[/color] 30. @Vulgard - Died Day 4 - [color=green]**Silviu200530: Town Ape Gorilla**[/color] 31. @Luxy - Died Day 4 - [color=green]**GGhana: Town Clown**[/color] 32. @WindwardAway - ITA'd Day 4 - [color=green]**Vulgard: Town Future Foundation Cult Leader**[/color] 33. @TrustworthyLiberal - Won Day 4 - [color=cyan]**astand: Imperial Pirate Detective**[/color] 34. @Jane - ITA'd Day 4 - [color=red]**Universal: Mafia Enabler**[/color] 35. @Centuries - ITA'd Day 4 - [color=red]**osieorb18: Mafia Sensei**[/color] 36. @an_gorta_pratai - Eliminated Day 4 - [color=red]**Lemonfairy: Mafia Sheepherder**[/color] 1. @Blizer - Killed Night 4 - [color=green]**Clonedcheese: Town Chronomancer**[/color] 33. @Emilia - Eliminated Day 5 - [color=green]**Aelin: Town Neighborhood Strategist**[/color] 18. @Lemonfairy - Killed Night 5 - [color=green]**Intensify: Town McDonald's Employee**[/color] 24. @Italy - Killed Night 5 - [color=green]**WindwardAway: Town Investigative JOAT**[/color] 1. @Mistyx - Killed Night 5 - [color=green]**min: Town Roleblocker**[/color] [details=Replacements] 1. thepigeonnyc 2. ATNoName 3. EliThePsycho 4. Blitz [/details] [details=Spectators] 1. Alice 2. Prophylaxis 3. Nerbins 4. 5. [/details] ## [color=ffe296]Threadmarks[/color] ### [u]****Day 1****[/u] - [**DAY 1 THREAD**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-night-1-44-47/88118?u=folannualmash) [**Event Announcement: Avatars**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/339?u=communityfm3) / [Voting](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5130?u=communityfm3) [**Event Announcement: 1610**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/1615?u=communityfm3) [**Event Announcement: Math Is Fun!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/3200?u=chloe) [**Event Announcement: Skribblio**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/3703) [**Substitution: lol replaces astand**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5265?u=communityfm3) [**Substitution: Esooa replaces Ami**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5652?u=communityfm3) [**Substitution: Leafia replaces Psyx**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/cfm3-main-thread-day-1-47-47/88118/5821?u=communityfm3) [**Eevee is modkilled**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/5903?u=chloe) - [color=green]**Italy: Town Godfather**[/color] [**Event Announcement: Surprising Details**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/5700?u=chloe) [**Firekitten dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-1-46-47/88118/6059?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**Marluxion: Town Tunneler**[/color] [**EoD1: Tangeld is eliminated!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-night-1-44-47/88118/8490?u=chloe) - [color=cyan]**TheLukundo: Imperial Passive JOAT**[/color] ### ****[u]Day 2[/u]**** - [**DAY 2 THREAD**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-thread-2-day-2/88190?u=chloe) [**SoD2: Marshal, Nightingale, and Wazza died in the night! Two NPCs have appeared!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/5?u=arete) [**Event Announcement: RopeStringFace's Return**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/98?u=arete) [**Event Announcement: Throne of Lies: Medieval Politics**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1273?u=arete) [**sulit dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1861?u=arete) - **[color = green]Appelsiini, Town ITA Nerfer[/color]** [**lol is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/1952?u=arete) - **[color = red]Joker, Mafia Suspicious Peddler[/color]** [**Intensify is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-39-47/88190/2457?u=folannualmash) - **No flip** [**TheLukundo is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-37-47/88190/2913?u=arete) - **[color = red]Jane, Mafia Spectator[/color]** [**A shot rings out! Nobody has died!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-thread-2-day-2/88190/2935?u=folannualmash) [**MaximusPrime is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-36-47/88190/3281?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**Mistyx: Town Support JOAT**[/color] [**Intensify flips!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-thread-2-day-2/88190/4830?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**an_gorta_pratai: Town Tree**[/color] [**Substitution: EliThePsycho replaces SirDerpsAlot**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-36-47/88190/5386?u=folannualmash) [**Boat Explosion Kills Six: Amelia, Hippo, Leafia, icibalus, KyoDaz, Joker**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-30-47/88190/5759?u=folannualmash) [**Min is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-30-47/88190/6107?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**ArcticXI: Town Ransomer**[/color] [**Only Whysper and Marluxion may be voted. Votes are reset.**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-2-29-47/88190/6935) [**EoD2: Whysper is eliminated and Silviu dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-night-2-27-47/88190/7447?u=folannualmash) ### ****[u]Day 3[/u]**** - [**DAY 3 THREAD**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-thread-3-day-3/88199?u=chloe) [**SoD3: Aelin and EliThePsycho died during the night!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-25-47/88199/3?u=chloe) [**Event Announcement: Storytime**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-24-47/88199/14?u=chloe) [**Marluxion dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-24-47/88199/168?u=chloe) - [color=green]**Firekitten: Town Spankvig**[/color] [**nutella is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-23-47/88199/1764?u=datbird) - [color=red]**orangeandblack5: Mafia Solar Car Cult Leader**[/color] [**Uni is shot in ITAs**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-3-22-47/88199/2207) - [color=green]**Solic: Town Time Reaper**[/color] [**EoD3: Appelsiini is eliminated!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-night-3-21-47/88199/6095?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**sulit: Town Strongman**[/color] ### ****[u]Day 4[/u]**** [**SoD4: Esooa, PKR, and ArcticXI died during the night!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-18-47/88209/4?u=chloe) [**Vulgard dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-17-47/88209/410?u=chloe) - [color=green]**Silviu200530: Town Ape Gorilla**[/color] [**Luxy dies!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-16-47/88209/674?u=folannualmash) - [color=green]**GGhana: Town Clown**[/color] [**WindwardAway is shot in ITAs and TrustworthyLiberal wins!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1334?u=chloe) [**Jane is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1348?u=chloe) - [color=red]**Universal: Mafia Enabler**[/color] [**Centuries is shot in ITAs!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/1491?u=chloe) - [color=red]**osieorb18: Mafia Sensei**[/color] [**EoD4: Gorta is eliminated!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-4-12-47/88209/2606?u=folannualmash) - [color=red]**Lemonfairy: Mafia Sheepherder**[/color] ### ****[u]Day 5[/u]**** [**SOD5: Blizer Died during the night**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-5-10-47/88209/2617) - [color=green]**Clonedcheese: Town Chronomancer**[/color] [**EoD5: Emilia Executed**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-6-6-47/88209/4161?u=datbird) - [color=green]**Aelin: Town Neighborhood Strategist**[/color] ### ****[u]Day 6[/u]**** [**SOD6: Lemon, Mistyx, and Italy all Died during the night**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-day-6-6-47/88209/4164?u=datbird) [**GAME END - Frostwolf is eliminated!**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-main-thread-game-over-mafia-imperials-win/88209/4954?u=chloe) ### [**Voting Thread**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-voting-thread/88117?u=folannualmash) ### [**ITA Thread**](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fam-itaing-thread/88191?u=folannualmash)
